response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it can serve an even greater purpose in your hands. I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $900,000. This is a significant discount compared to its true worth, which I believe reflects my confidence in its value to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
